original: ALM, Carl Gideon, Advokat, Stockholm, f 12/3 02 av rotem C A o Anna Forssell, gm Dagny Nilsson. Studex Sthlm 20, jur kand StHS 27. E.o. tjm ÖÄ f uppb.ärend 21—27, tingstjg Sollentuna o Färentuna doms 27—30, tjg Svea hovr 30, adv Sthlm sed. 31, eg verksamh sed. 32; led Sv adv.samf sed. 34. Ag o beb fastigh Stocksund. Kyrkoflm Oscars förs 32—34, v. ordf Stocks kommun.nmd sed. 44.
translated: ALM, Carl Gideon, Lawyer, Stockholm, b. 12/3 02 to rootsman C A and Anna Forssell, m. Dagny Nilsson. Studied in Stockholm 1920, graduated in law from StHS 1927. Deputy clerk at the ÖÄ (Administrative Court) handling collection matters 1921-1927, court clerk at Sollentuna and Färentuna district courts 1927-1930, court clerk at Svea Court of Appeal 1930, lawyer in Stockholm since 1931, self-employed since 1932; member of the Swedish Bar Association since 1934. Owns agricultural and residential property in Stocksund. Member of the church board of Oscars förs 1932-1934, vice chairman of Stocks municipality committee since 1944.
